sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {NgOptimizedImage} from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'hero', imports: [ NgOptimizedImage ], template: `

Welcome to Future Formula 1

Experience the thrill of motorsport

`, styles: ` .text-shadow { text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); } `, standalone: true }) export class Hero { }
